```{r}
link <- "https://www.billboard.com/charts/hot-100/2000-03-11/"

link_read <- read_html(link)

node <- xml_find_all(link_read, "//li[@class='o-chart-results-list__item // lrv-u-flex-grow-1 lrv-u-flex lrv-u-flex-direction-column lrv-u-justify-content-center lrv-u-border-b-1 u-border-b-0@mobile-max lrv-u-border-color-grey-light  lrv-u-padding-l-1@mobile-max']")

song <- xml_text(xml_children(node)[1])
artist <- xml_text(xml_children(node)[2])

```
